How much do you still stand?
04 Nov 2019, 08:45 by Maria Kariki

Many times and for various reasons one reaches its limits.

Sometimes it breaks out and sometimes it doesn't. At times he feels the need to react and at times he is silent. Our emotions and our emotional fluctuations shape our patience and endurance accordingly. Convince yourself that you can still a little bit, while on the other hand you want to get out a cry of indignation and anger and give up on what is tiring and irritating you.
You do not know why you often get trapped, because you have nerves, because you have explosions, because you have sadness. You look for responsibility, you look for what and how much it is to blame for the mental fatigue you feel. On the one hand you need to understand exactly what is happening to you and on the other you do not want to realize and accept your own participation in the deadlock you are experiencing. It is more "digestible" to blame others. It is more comforting.
But where comes the moment when you can no longer blindfold. You can no longer hear excuses from yourself. You cannot prolong your "misery". Wondering why you can still stand? Wondering where you can find the strength to do this? Is it the habit, is it the routine, is it the fear of the new? What is it that keeps you in bondage in situations and people who only do you no good? Why do you insist on something that doesn't draw? Something that doesn't satisfy you anymore?
Roles, obligations, responsibilities, mixed with anxieties, worries and frustrations make you more tolerant, more cautious about impulse. You seek safety more than satisfaction itself. You're afraid to 'deflect', to risk, to react. And of course at cost, at mental cost. Everything that is tolerated with discomfort is transformed into repulsive, oppressed material. You carry a lot of things that are slowly becoming useless. You become a moving "time bomb", but you don't realize it to the extent it should. You think you can afford it. Do you think this is a "phase" that will pass ...
What, though, if your psychic stocks run out of steam? What if you have no more tolerance to give? What can hold back the momentum resulting from the awareness of a backwater? It is then that the uncontrolled self begins to declare his presence. A self that can no longer withstand the same and the same routine and any oppression it involves! And then everything is likely to collapse. The data are questioned and re-evaluated. You review and negotiate from the beginning all your life and your choices.
Not to regret something you did, but to make sure you're still on your "right" path. If you've moved too far, maybe it's time for decisions and change ... You don't have to spend every day "coping" with it. Every single day is unique, precious and without a return. Nothing is as good as your peace of mind. Anything that undermines and erodes it must be found and named! Do something about it. Claim what you deserve. Do not allow halves, mats and passive acceptance. So how long can you still be something you don't want to be? To live a life that no longer represents you?
